category.name: Product Structure.QSearch Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: QS_IGNORE_JT_USER_VOLUME
preference.preference_description: Determines if Teamcenter stores TruShape data files in the volume of the JT file owner when the create_or_update_bbox_and_tso command runs. Valid Values: False - TSO (TruShape data) files are stored in the JT file owner's volume. True - TSO (TruShape data) files are not stored in the JT file owner's volume.
